glossary.momentum: Momemtnum (mom5, mom10) measures the rate of change of the stock price over 5 and 10 days respectively.
glossary.volatility: Volatility (vol10, vol20) indicates the degree of variation of stock prices over 10 and 20 days respectively.
glossary.z_score_ma20: Z-score of the 20-day moving average (z_ma20) standardizes the moving average to identify how far the current price is from the average.
glossary.bollinger_band_percent_b: Bollinger Band Percent B (bbp20) shows the position of the stock price relative to the Bollinger Bands over a 20-day period.
glossary.log_return: Log Return (logreturn) is the natural logarithm of the ratio of consecutive closing prices, used to measure the return of the stock.
glossary.adjusted_close: Adjusted Close (adj_close) is the closing price of the stock adjusted for dividends and stock splits.
glossary.auc: Area Under the Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve (AUC) measures the ability of a model to distinguish between classes.
glossary.brier_score: Brier Score measures the accuracy of probabilistic predictions; lower scores indicate better accuracy.
